SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_LOADINTERACTIONS
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: BrightVine Solutions
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure DBO.USR_USP_LOADINTERACTIONS ( @PROCESSID uniqueidentifier = null ) as begin select ID, OBJECTIVE SENTIMENTTEXT from [dbo].[INTERACTION] where ISINTERACTION=1 end
